description:
This course is for those who need to increase their market value by learning a powerful skill Like Public Speaking.

It's for those who need to communicate and talk to people and get their ideas across clearly and effectively.

This course, is particularly useful for absolute beginners and for those whose first language is not English.

In this course, we'll look at ways to get rid of your fear and anxiety of public speaking.

We'll also look at the qualities and tools, that you need to deliver a powerful presentation.

At the end of the course, you will be able to prepare, organize and deliver your speech in a clear and effective manner.

I have included several lists of useful phrases to be used in the different parts of a speech. In addition you will also find grammar structures especially useful for non native English speakers when presenting a speech.

There are :

  • 30 lectures
  • over 1 hour of video content
  • 29 pages of useful resources for Non Native English Speakers.
title: Empower Your Speaking Skills: Visualize Your Success
